def_cn: 对驾驶员指手画脚的乘客
def_en: If you refer to a passenger in a car as a back-seat driver, they annoy you because they constantly give you advice.

def_cn: （尤指政客中）企图越俎代庖的人，干涉与己无关之事的人
def_en: If you refer to someone, especially a politician, as a back-seat driver, you disapprove of them because they try to influence a situation that does not concern them.
